sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_7a11a77f2f76330097f2f3ecf699b688
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SR_ChangeRequest_LCM_Cancellation</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SR_ChangeRequest_LCM_Cancellation</name><script><![CDATA[var SR_ChangeRequest_LCM_Cancellation = Class.create();
SR_ChangeRequest_LCM_Cancellation.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	lifeCycleManagementCancellation : function(changeState){
		gs.log('inside LCM cancellation function ');//inside LCM cancellation function
		gs.log('change state : '+changeState);//'change state : '-4
		var changeStateMap = {
			"-4" : {
				"stateName":"Access",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.cancellation.assess"),
				"query" : "state=-4^start_dateSTARTSWITH",
				"relativeTo" : "month",
				"moveToState": "4",
				"close_code" : "unsuccessful",
				"close_note" : "unattended change request"
			},
			"-3" : {
				"stateName":"Authorize",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.cancellation.authorize"),
				"query" : "state=-3^start_dateSTARTSWITH",
				"relativeTo" : "month",
				"moveToState": "4",
				"close_code" : "unsuccessful",
				"close_note" : "unattended change request"
			},
			"-2" : {
				"stateName":"Schedule",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.cancellation.schedule"),
				"query" : "state=-2^end_dateSTARTSWITH",
				"relativeTo" : "day",
				"moveToState": "4",
				"close_code" : "unsuccessful",
				"close_note" : "unattended change request"
			},
			"-1" : {
				"stateName":"Implement",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.cancellation.implement"),
				"query" : "state=-1^end_dateSTARTSWITH",
				"relativeTo" : "year",
				"moveToState": "0",
				"close_code" : "unsuccessful",
				"close_note" : "unattended change request"
			},
			"0" : {
				"stateName":"Review",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.cancellation.review"),
				"query" : "state IN 0 ^ end_date STARTSWITH",
				"relativeTo" : "year",
				"moveToState": "4",
				"close_code" : "",
				"close_note" : "unattended change request"
			},
		};
		
		var queryDate =this._getDate(changeStateMap[changeState].relativeTo, changeStateMap[changeState].reminderDuration);
		gs.log('queryDate : '+queryDate);//29-01-2019
		var finalQuery = gs.getMessage("{0}{1}",[changeStateMap[changeState].query,queryDate]);
		gs.log('finalQuery : '+ finalQuery);//state=-4^start_dateSTARTSWITH2019-01-29 state=-4^start_dateSTARTSWITH 2019-01-29
		var change_request = new GlideRecord('change_request');
		change_request.addEncodedQuery(finalQuery);
		change_request.query();
		gs.log('change_request.getRowCount() : '+change_request.getRowCount());
		
		if(changeState==-1){
			var changeRequestNumber = [];
			while (change_request.next()){
				gs.log('sysid : '+change_request.getUniqueValue());
				changeRequestNumber.push(change_request.getUniqueValue().toString());
			}
			gs.log('changeRequestNumber : '+ changeRequestNumber.join());
			this._cancelChangeTask(changeRequestNumber);
		}
		this._updateChange(change_request, changeStateMap[changeState].moveToState, changeStateMap[changeState].close_code, changeStateMap[changeState].close_note);


	},
	
	_getDate :function(relativeTo, duration){
		
		gs.log('inside getdate function');
		var queryDate=new GlideDateTime(gs.nowDateTime());
		if(relativeTo=='day'){
			queryDate.addDays(duration);
		}
		else if(relativeTo=='month'){
			queryDate.addMonths(duration);
		}
		else if(relativeTo=='year'){
			queryDate.addYears(duration);
		}
		return queryDate.getDate();
	},
	
	_cancelChangeTask :function(changeRequestNumber){
		gs.log('cancel change task function');		
		var ctask = new GlideRecord('change_task');
		ctask.addQuery('change_request','IN',changeRequestNumber);
		ctask.query();
		ctask.setValue('state',"4");
		ctask.updateMultiple();
	},
	
	_updateChange : function(changeRequest, state, closeCode, closeNote){
		gs.log('inside update change function');
		if(!gs.nil(state)){
			changeRequest.setValue('state',state);
		}
		if(!gs.nil(closeCode)){
			changeRequest.setValue('close_code',closeCode);
		}
		if(!gs.nil(closeNote)){
			changeRequest.setValue('close_notes',closeNote);
		}
		changeRequest.updateMultiple();
	},

	type: 'SR_ChangeRequest_LCM_Cancellation'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-07-29 15:41:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>7a11a77f2f76330097f2f3ecf699b688</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR_ChangeRequest_LCM_Cancellation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7a11a77f2f76330097f2f3ecf699b688</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-07-31 09:10:05</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4f709aa82fb2330097f2f3ecf699b642
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SR_ChangeRequest_LifeCycleManagement</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Script to call therequired event to send the notification inn Change Life Cycle Management</description><name>SR_ChangeRequest_LifeCycleManagement</name><script><![CDATA[var SR_ChangeRequest_LifeCycleManagement = Class.create();
SR_ChangeRequest_LifeCycleManagement.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},

	sendReminderNotifications : function(changeState){

		var changeStateMap = {
			"-4" : {
				"stateName":"Access",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.assess.reminderdays"),
				"eventToNotify" : "SR.Change.Reminder.Notify.Access",
				"queryDateField" : "start_date",
			},
			"-3" : {
				"stateName":"Authorize",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.authorize.reminderdays"),
				"eventToNotify" : "SR.Change.Reminder.Notify.Authorize",
				"queryDateField" : "start_date",
			},
			"-2" : {
				"stateName":"Scheduled",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.scheduled.reminderdays"),
				"eventToNotify" : "SR.Change.Reminder.Notify.Scheduled",
				"queryDateField" : "start_date",
			},
			"-1" : {
				"stateName":"Implement",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.implement.reminderdays"),
				"eventToNotify" : "SR.Change.Reminder.Notify.Implement",
				"queryDateField" : "end_date",
			},
			"0" : {
				"stateName":"Review",
				"reminderDuration":gs.getProperty("change.review.reminderdays"),
				"eventToNotify" : "SR.Change.Reminder.Notify.Review",
				"queryDateField" : "end_date",
			},
		};

		var query = (function getQuery(changeState){
			var plannedStartDate = new GlideDateTime(gs.nowDateTime());
			plannedStartDate.addDays(changeStateMap[changeState].reminderDuration);
			var query = gs.getMessage("state in {0} ^ {1} STARTSWITH {2}",[changeState,changeStateMap[changeState].queryDateField,plannedStartDate.getDate()]);
			return query;
		})(changeState);

		var changeGR =  new GlideRecord("change_request");
		changeGR.addQuery(query);
		changeGR.query();
		while (changeGR.next()){
			gs.eventQueue(changeStateMap[changeState].eventToNotify,changeGR,'','');
		}



	},

	type: 'SR_ChangeRequest_LifeCycleManagement'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-07-19 07:29:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>4f709aa82fb2330097f2f3ecf699b642</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SR_ChangeRequest_LifeCycleManagement</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4f709aa82fb2330097f2f3ecf699b642</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-07-29 15:56:08</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
